mapper.select: select a.board_no, a.title, a.reg_date, b.name, a.view_cnt from (select rownum rnum, c.* from(select * from tb_notice order by board_no desc) c)a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no where rnum between #{begin} and #{end}
select a.board_no, a.title, a.reg_date, b.name, a.view_cnt, a.content from tb_notice a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no where board_no = #{boardNo}
